## ReadableARTH interface

Read the state of the ARTH protocol.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ReadableARTH 
```

## Remarks

Implemented by [EthersARTH](./arth-ethers.ethersarth.md)<!-- -->.

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [getARTHBalance(address)](./arth-base.readablearth.getarthbalance.md) | Get the amount of ARTH held by an address. |
|  [getARTHInStabilityPool()](./arth-base.readablearth.getarthinstabilitypool.md) | Get the total amount of ARTH currently deposited in the Stability Pool. |
|  [getCollateralSurplusBalance(address)](./arth-base.readablearth.getcollateralsurplusbalance.md) | Get the amount of leftover collateral available for withdrawal by an address. |
|  [getFees()](./arth-base.readablearth.getfees.md) | Get a calculator for current fees. |
|  [getFrontendStatus(address)](./arth-base.readablearth.getfrontendstatus.md) | Check whether an address is registered as a ARTH frontend, and what its kickback rate is. |
|  [getNumberOfTroves()](./arth-base.readablearth.getnumberoftroves.md) | Get number of Troves that are currently open. |
|  [getPrice()](./arth-base.readablearth.getprice.md) | Get the current price of the native currency (e.g. Ether) in USD. |
|  [getRemainingStabilityPoolMAHAReward()](./arth-base.readablearth.getremainingstabilitypoolmahareward.md) | Get the remaining MAHA that will be collectively rewarded to stability depositors. |
|  [getStabilityDeposit(address)](./arth-base.readablearth.getstabilitydeposit.md) | Get the current state of a Stability Deposit. |
|  [getTotal()](./arth-base.readablearth.gettotal.md) | Get the total amount of collateral and debt in the ARTH system. |
|  [getTotalRedistributed()](./arth-base.readablearth.gettotalredistributed.md) | Get the total collateral and debt per stake that has been liquidated through redistribution. |
|  [getTrove(address)](./arth-base.readablearth.gettrove.md) | Get the current state of a Trove. |
|  [getTroveBeforeRedistribution(address)](./arth-base.readablearth.gettrovebeforeredistribution.md) | Get a Trove in its state after the last direct modification. |
|  [getTroves(params)](./arth-base.readablearth.gettroves_1.md) | Get a slice from the list of Troves. |
